::Spears:;

She pulled a quill from her side and extended it into a spear and ran 
after Striker.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Savage's shots hit the Ark's hull, the metal finally giving and 
caving in 
> with a huge clatter. Inside, Striker swears as the whole ship 
shakes.
> 
> "They never give up, do they?" he mumbles, taking out his gun.
> 
> "Allright, yet another battle!" he says, running for the exit, 
motioning 
> Spears to follow him.
